mods.abstract: Product model of industrial machinery. Lettering on the image of the machine reads, "WHELAND COMPANY, CHATTANOOGA, TENN., USA." A handwritten note on the front cover of the item reads, "7-C set works with Air Booster." A stamp on the reverse of the image reads, "Floyd Gates, Tulsa, Okla."

originInfo.publisher: Chattanooga Public Library; University of Tennessee at Chattanooga

titleInfo.title: Wheland Foundry and United States Pipe and Foundry Company photographs
Chattanooga History Collections
Wheland Foundry and United States Pipe and Foundry Company photographs

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT. Metadata originally created in a locally modified version of Qualified Dublin Core using ContentDM (data dictionary available: https://dltn-technical-docs.readthedocs.io).
